resources.string: adb [-s < specific device>] shell am broadcast -a com.example.amotz.mockLocationForDeveloper.updateLocation [-e lat <latitude>] [-e lon <longitude>] [-e alt <altitude>] [-e accurate <accurate>]
adb shell am broadcast -a com.example.amotz.mockLocationForDeveloper.updateLocation -e lat 15.3 -e lon 99
